content:
SelectionMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the selection behavior of a list box.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
public enum SelectionMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SelectionMode

Remarks

This enumeration is used by classes such as ListBox and CheckedListBox.

Fields

MultiExtended

Multiple items can be selected, and the user can use the SHIFT, CTRL, and arrow keys to make selections
MultiSimple

Multiple items can be selected.
None

No items can be selected.
One

Only one item can be selected.
